long_description: Clean graphics and quality construction make the Scott 720 ski poles a popular choice to guide you down the slopes. S2.5 shaft is manufactured with high-grade aluminum alloy and is computer engineered for excellent strength. P-Core grip system features a thermoplastic rubber that is injection-molded over a polypropylene core for a secure, comfortable grip. Comfort straps include molded rubber platforms to support your hands; woven nylon straps are strong and durable. 3.6 in. disc baskets blend aerodynamic efficiency and durability; they're ideal for packed snow conditions. Scott 720 skis poles feature hardened metal tips that offer superb hold in icy conditions.
short_description: Clean graphics and quality construction make the Scott 720 ski poles a popular choice to guide you down the slopes.
